data.title: Arthur Lake
data.text:
AKA Arthur Silverlake

Born: 17-Apr-1905

Birthplace: Corbin, KY

Died: 9-Jan-1987

Location of death: Indian Wells, CA

Cause of death: Heart Failure

Remains: Buried, Hollywood Forever Cemetery, Hollywood, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Dagwood Bumstead

Sister: Florence Lake

Wife: Patricia Davies (dau. of Marion Davies, m. 1942, until his death, two children)

Daughter: Marion Rose (b. 1944)

TELEVISION

Blondie Dagwood Bumstead (1957)
